content: crochet pattern for forget me not bracelet a step-by-step guide to creating a floral masterpiece crafting a forget me not bracelet with crochet is a delightful way to combine artistry and sentimentality this floral bracelet inspired by the delicate beauty of the forget-me-not flower makes a perfect accessory or thoughtful gift below is a detailed crochet pattern that guides you from start to finish simply kraft by stella trail ©all rights reserved skill level beginner supplies needed yarn 100% acrylic dk weight yarn o dark blue stylecraft special dk colour lapis o blue stylecraft special dk colour aster o yellow sirdar hayfield bonus dk colour sunshine rubber band or hair tie with diameter 3cm crochet hook size 3 5 mm scissors tapestry needle for weaving in ends abbreviations used chain chain stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet step 1 create the bracelet start with the base of your bracelet which will serve as the foundation for the flowers foundation row using dark blue yarn lapis make a slip knot with holding the rubber band insert hook yarn over and make 7sc with the last stitch pull a longer loop remove the hook turn re-insert the hook into the loop 7 stitches row 1 single_crochet in 1st stitch repeat single_crochet for 6 more time with the last stitch pull a longer loop remove the hook turn re-insert the hook into the loop 7 stitches repeat row 1 until the desired length simply kraft by stella trail ©all rights reserved last row attach the other side of rubber band make another 7sc 7 stitches fasten_off and weave in the ends step 2 crochet the forget me not flowers the flowers are the highlight of this bracelet representing the delicate beauty of nature flower centre using yellow yarn sunshine make a magic_ring round 1 work 10 single_crochet into the ring slip_stitch to join fasten_off leave a long yarn thread for assembling flower petals switch to blue yarn aster and attach to any single_crochet in the flower centre round 2 *chain 3 4 treble_crochet into the next single_crochet chain 3 slip_stitch into the next single_crochet* repeat around for 5 petals slip_stitch into the 1st chain stitch simply kraft by stella trail ©all rights reserved fasten_off and weave in ends you can make multiple flowers and attach to the bracelet later step 4 assemble the bracelet now it s time to attach the flowers to the bracelet arrange the flowers and leaves along the bracelet base in your desired pattern using a tapestry needle and matching yarn sew each flower and leaf securely onto the base you can use hot glue to make it more secure care instructions to keep your forget me not bracelet looking fresh and vibrant hand wash gently using mild soap and cold water lay flat to dry to prevent distortion simply kraft by stella trail ©all rights reserved
